attributes.title: Raise Yourself towards Superconsciousness || Part 6 || Shiva Sutras || 13 July 2006
attributes.description:
Name Of The Program : Shiva Sutras Part 6
Session on: Raise Yourself towards Superconsciousness
Date : 13 July 2006
Venue : Adikailaasa, Bidadi, Bengaluru

In this video Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism HDH #Nithyananda Paramashivam gives a detailed explanation on pulling ourself to the #superconsciousness. This is a video excerpt on Shiva Sutras conducted on 13 July 2006 in Adikailaasa, Bidadi, Bengaluru. Here HDH also gives the participant a short technique to practice which gives everyone a really a #breakthrough.

https://youtu.be/5mxCV8s9Mo4. Part 1
https://youtu.be/qv7fVLwiOc8.   Part 2
https://youtu.be/tB02zCXn7Qw.   Part 3
https://youtu.be/7wBCBxcyjFs.   Part 4
https://youtu.be/Ze_y_2M6TFY    Part 5
